name: Search single comic

testSteps.description: 1: Search single comic ({id=1332, title="X-Men: Days of Future Past (Trade Paperback)"})

children.description: Given the user is connected to the Marvel Developer API
When sends a GET request using id 1332
Johan our get
GET https://gateway.marvel.com/v1/public/comics/1332?ts=1&apikey=b41d14e5440d6cc1519c67b31f64af68&hash=d04d92d0727ab76f46b940883b00a3d0

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Encoding: gzip
ETag: da22683b9808bd87bb7cf6571c7cd935ae368d22
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Date: Mon, 20 May 2024 15:44:53 GMT
Connection: keep-alive
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

children.description: Then comic name should be "X-Men: Days of Future Past (Trade Paperback)"
Title should be equal
And should receive a response of 200
